lines.text: If you fuck with the French, you fuck with history!
Everybody wants to go to heaven, but nobody wants to die.
No we haven't. What's going on?
Well we're trying to chase down a pack of coyotes.
I'd like to share this dream I had last night with you if that's okay?
[Natassia nods and the dream sequence begins]

I was running on the beach, and I started running towards her. She was this beautiful asian girl, she had this amazing tan. Anyway, I kept running towards her, faster and faster. But the faster I ran, the further away she got. So I kept on running faster and faster, but she kept getting further and further away. Then all of a sudden she just appeared right in front of me... Then she changed into General Schweinkopf, just like that.
Greco-Roman wrestling is the fastest growing sport in America, except for soccer, baseball, badminton, and certain equestrian events.
They're fucking, at least somebody is. Jacking off so much my hand has a headache.
